name: Save the Lizards
description:
The lizards are in danger, and only Lizard Man can save them! Rescue Lizard Man's small friends along the highway while avoiding numerous dangers, including police activity and industrial hazards.

This release is the full remastered version of Save the Lizards for Windows (compiled for 32-bit, both 32-bit and 64-bit are supported). Keyboard or game controller required. See "README.txt" for full installation and usage information.
